sentences.en: About a hundred years ago a few feeble efforts were made on behalf of the left - hander.
sentences.cn: 大约一百年前,有人曾为左撇子们做过一些微不足道的努力.

sentences.en: Cashman also resisted trading his own prospects, particularly right - hander Philip Hughes and outfielder Jose Tabata.
sentences.cn: 现金男也不愿意交易掉他自己的新秀, 特别是右投休斯和外野手塔巴塔.

sentences.en: Each weaponsmith spec can make a 1 - hander and a 2 - hander.
sentences.cn: 锻造——每种武器锻造分支可以锻造一把 单手 和一把双手武器.

sentences.en: Letting the car settle allowed us to power through the fun left - hander up ahead.
sentences.cn: 让汽车解决使我们能够通过权力的乐趣左手上涨.

sentences.en: New York will send right - hander Chien - Ming Wang to the mound for the series finale.
sentences.cn: 洋基对这次将派上他们的右投手王建民来结束这场系列战.

sentences.en: Over his last three starts , the right - hander has gone 2 - 0 with a 1.29 ERA.
sentences.cn: 在他过去的三次先发, 这位右投手取得2胜0负和1.29的自责失分率.

sentences.en: The handy left - hander left a handsome handkerchief on the handle of the handbag.
sentences.cn: 手巧的 左撇子 把一方漂亮手帕留在手提包的提手上.

sentences.en: The handy left - hander left handsome handkerchief on the handle of the handbag.
sentences.cn: 手巧的 左撇子 把一方标致手帕留在手提包的提手上.

sentences.en: The right - hander believes he will pitch well tonight.
sentences.cn: 这位右投手相信他今晚将会有场好表现.

sentences.en: The right - hander has been off for about a full week because of the all - star break.
sentences.cn: 这位右投手,因为明星赛的季中休息,迄今已有整周没上场了.

sentences.en: This play for a left - hander would definitely be more difficult.
sentences.cn: 这个动作对左手捕手来说无疑的是比较难一点.
